channel.title: Arts on unwiredcouch.com
channel.description: Recent content in Arts on unwiredcouch.com

item.title: Abigail Brand
item.description: Abigail Brand in her suit and tie outfit from S.W.O.R.D. #5, drawn by Valerio Schiti. I’m still reading Reign of X and Brand is such a good and badass character that I just had to attempt to draw her. This is another watercolor and ink sketch, done while watching TV.
item.content:encoded: Abigail Brand in her suit and tie outfit from S.W.O.R.D. #5, drawn by Valerio Schiti. I’m still reading Reign of X and Brand is such a good and badass character that I just had to attempt to draw her. This is another watercolor and ink sketch, done while watching TV.

item.title: Hot chocolate painting
item.description: Quick watercolor sketch while watching TV. I tend to focus on people a lot with my art so I wanted to do something different where I’d mostly practice values. The reference is from Watercolor Affair but I decided to not follow the tutorial and try out where I’d end up by myself instead.
item.content:encoded: Quick watercolor sketch while watching TV. I tend to focus on people a lot with my art so I wanted to do something different where I’d mostly practice values. The reference is from Watercolor Affair but I decided to not follow the tutorial and try out where I’d end up by myself instead.

item.title: Rachel Summers
item.description: Still feeling inspired by Phil Noto’s art reading the Reign of X storyline. So here’s a TV evening Rachel Summers sketch this time based on a panel in X-Men #16 #art #watercolor #ink #mastoart
item.content:encoded: Still feeling inspired by Phil Noto’s art reading the Reign of X storyline. So here’s a TV evening Rachel Summers sketch this time based on a panel in X-Men #16 #art #watercolor #ink #mastoart

item.title: Domino
item.description: Been a while since I did some art. So tonight in order to study from the best I drew this Domino in ink and watercolor based on a panel in Cable #8 (part of the Reign of X storyline) by Phil Noto.
item.content:encoded: Been a while since I did some art. So tonight in order to study from the best I drew this Domino in ink and watercolor based on a panel in Cable #8 (part of the Reign of X storyline) by Phil Noto.

item.title: Ramona Flowers
item.description: not much time for art lately. But I at least took some time for a quick Ramona Flowers (from the Scott Pilgrim comic/movie) sketch with ink and watercolor tonight
item.content:encoded: not much time for art lately. But I at least took some time for a quick Ramona Flowers (from the Scott Pilgrim comic/movie) sketch with ink and watercolor tonight

item.title: Hercule Poirot
item.description: A quick sketch for this week. Staying with the theme of oldschool TV. David Suchet as Hercule Poirot in pencil and ink. #art
item.content:encoded: A quick sketch for this week. Staying with the theme of oldschool TV. David Suchet as Hercule Poirot in pencil and ink. #art

item.title: Nick Fury from the Secret Invasion TV show
item.description: I’ve not been making time for art these last couple of months and I’m trying to get back into it. Feels incredibly rusty but I did a Secret Invasion Nick Fury tonight that I don’t completely hate
item.content:encoded: I’ve not been making time for art these last couple of months and I’m trying to get back into it. Feels incredibly rusty but I did a Secret Invasion Nick Fury tonight that I don’t completely hate

item.title: Green Ranger
item.description:
RIP Jason David Frank

I very much still remember the emotions those Saturday mornings when the Green Ranger showed up and first wrecked havoc to the Rangers, summoning his Zord with the dagger flute, before finally joining the good side and the Power Rangers to fight evil and eventually becoming the White Ranger. I seems a bit silly now writing it all out all these years later. But back then it blew my kid brain and was the main topic of many debates on the school yard. Thanks for everything!
item.content:encoded:
RIP Jason David Frank

I very much still remember the emotions those Saturday mornings when the Green Ranger showed up and first wrecked havoc to the Rangers, summoning his Zord with the dagger flute, before finally joining the good side and the Power Rangers to fight evil and eventually becoming the White Ranger. I seems a bit silly now writing it all out all these years later. But back then it blew my kid brain and was the main topic of many debates on the school yard. Thanks for everything!

#art #powerrangers #greenranger #jasondavidfrank #watercolor

item.title: MF DOOM
item.description: MF Doom. Some Friday night art. Watercolor and ink in the sketchbook.
item.content:encoded: MF Doom. Some Friday night art. Watercolor and ink in the sketchbook.

item.title: Kate
item.description: I watched ‚ÄúKate‚Äù with Mary Elizabeth Winstead and while I usually don‚Äôt enjoy gory movies too much I enjoyed that one a lot. Lots of good fight scenes and the general atmosphere was pretty cool.
item.content:encoded:
I watched ‚ÄúKate‚Äù with Mary Elizabeth Winstead and while I usually don‚Äôt enjoy gory movies too much I enjoyed that one a lot. Lots of good fight scenes and the general atmosphere was pretty cool.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #watercolor #ink #movies #kate #instaart

item.title: Splinter
item.description:
dramatic Splinter

I would definitely watch a TMNT show about a younger Splinter pre-Turtles that just runs around a does badass ninja stuff. Got inspired for this by the recent absolutely amazing @bosslogic Metal Gear Solid cyborg ninja posts for the MGS anniversary. And thought which other popular fighters would fit such a pose.
item.content:encoded:
dramatic Splinter

I would definitely watch a TMNT show about a younger Splinter pre-Turtles that just runs around a does badass ninja stuff. Got inspired for this by the recent absolutely amazing @bosslogic Metal Gear Solid cyborg ninja posts for the MGS anniversary. And thought which other popular fighters would fit such a pose.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #ink #watercolor #splinter #tmnt #turtles #instaart #comicart

item.title: The One Who Remains
item.description: Pretty excited for this dude to show up and show some Avengers what‚Äôs up. I started the sketch while watching Loki season 1 and finally took the time to finish it
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Conan and Tetra
item.description: I gave sketching my version of a Conan panel from the one book I had as a kid a try. Swipe to see the original and the cover of the book. It was the only Conan book I had as a kid but I devoured it and was fascinated by the stories. So I wanted to see how it would look like if I gave it a try. I took some inspiration for Conan from @mahmudasrar‚Äôs version (his art is amazing and a constant inspiration for me to get better) but tried to still stay close to the original.
item.content:encoded:
I gave sketching my version of a Conan panel from the one book I had as a kid a try. Swipe to see the original and the cover of the book. It was the only Conan book I had as a kid but I devoured it and was fascinated by the stories. So I wanted to see how it would look like if I gave it a try. I took some inspiration for Conan from @mahmudasrar‚Äôs version (his art is amazing and a constant inspiration for me to get better) but tried to still stay close to the original.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #comicart #watercolor #conan #conanthebarbarian

item.title: Dr. Beverly Crusher
item.description: Dr. Beverly Crusher, Star Trek TNG. It‚Äôs been hard to find time for art lately. And the more I don‚Äôt do it the more I stress myself about having to make something really good to make it count. So today I just took my art supplies while watching TV and decided to see what happens. And I don‚Äôt hate it üò¨. . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #drawing #painting #watercolor #strathmore #fabercastell #watercolorpencils #ink #startrek #beverlycrusher #tng #tvshow #tv #instaart
item.content:encoded: Dr. Beverly Crusher, Star Trek TNG. It‚Äôs been hard to find time for art lately. And the more I don‚Äôt do it the more I stress myself about having to make something really good to make it count. So today I just took my art supplies while watching TV and decided to see what happens. And I don‚Äôt hate it üò¨. . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #drawing #painting #watercolor #strathmore #fabercastell #watercolorpencils #ink #startrek #beverlycrusher #tng #tvshow #tv #instaart

item.title: Columbo
item.description: Columbo. This started as a traditional quick sketch on paper while watching TV. And then I was too lazy to get my watercolors and colored this in procreate with mostly the watercolor brush. I generally have a hard time with creating digital art (I just enjoy traditional more). But this approach inspired by @schmoedraws‚Äô process she shared on her Patreon really worked for me. . . #art #sketch #painting #procreate #digitalart #columbo #peterfalk #tv #watercolor #instaart
item.content:encoded: Columbo. This started as a traditional quick sketch on paper while watching TV. And then I was too lazy to get my watercolors and colored this in procreate with mostly the watercolor brush. I generally have a hard time with creating digital art (I just enjoy traditional more). But this approach inspired by @schmoedraws‚Äô process she shared on her Patreon really worked for me. . . #art #sketch #painting #procreate #digitalart #columbo #peterfalk #tv #watercolor #instaart

item.title: Lebron James
item.description: LeBron James sketch. Pencil on toned paper. This started as a loose underdrawing for a painting. Then I decided to tighten the pencils a bit more and now I don‚Äôt know anymore if I want to paint over it üòÇ. .
item.content:encoded:
LeBron James sketch. Pencil on toned paper. This started as a loose underdrawing for a painting. Then I decided to tighten the pencils a bit more and now I don‚Äôt know anymore if I want to paint over it üòÇ. .

But still decided to color it a couple of days later. Watercolor and watercolor pencils. And a little bit of ink for some small details. That counts for #inktober, right? üòÜ . . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #drawing #painting #watercolor #watercolorpainting #watercolorpencils #ink #markers #lebronjames #basketball #üèÄ #üëë #tonedpaper #fabercastell #strathmorepaper #royaltalens #instaart

item.title: Adrianne Sloboh
item.description: watercolor practice with the new @etchr_lab brushes. Trying to capture some of that mesmerizing magic of an @adrianne.sloboh flip. Still so much to learn but I really enjoyed painting this one and the brushes are really nice. . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #watercolor #painting #drawing #artstudy #practice #skateboard #kickflip #tonedpaper #etchrlab #fabercastell #royaltalens #instaartist #instaart
item.content:encoded: watercolor practice with the new @etchr_lab brushes. Trying to capture some of that mesmerizing magic of an @adrianne.sloboh flip. Still so much to learn but I really enjoyed painting this one and the brushes are really nice. . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #watercolor #painting #drawing #artstudy #practice #skateboard #kickflip #tonedpaper #etchrlab #fabercastell #royaltalens #instaartist #instaart

item.title: Spider-Man 2018 vs. 2020
item.description: 2018 vs 2020. To the week 2 years ago I decided that I wanted to learn how to draw with basically no idea how to do it. I watched a ton of @jimlee stream videos on YouTube and in that first week I drew the bottom Spider-Man sketch and it took me about 3 hours. Since then art has become such a big part of my life and one of the most joyful hobbies I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôve tried out so many mediums, discovered artists and their wonderful art, and learned to appreciate comic books in a completely new way. I decided to redraw the sketch how I would do it today (and in about an hour). It‚Äôs too easy to think I‚Äôve not learned anything in the last 2 years when drawings don‚Äôt turn out the way I want. But this exercise really made me realize how far I‚Äôve come, even if I know how far I still want to go.
item.content:encoded:
2018 vs 2020. To the week 2 years ago I decided that I wanted to learn how to draw with basically no idea how to do it. I watched a ton of @jimlee stream videos on YouTube and in that first week I drew the bottom Spider-Man sketch and it took me about 3 hours. Since then art has become such a big part of my life and one of the most joyful hobbies I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôve tried out so many mediums, discovered artists and their wonderful art, and learned to appreciate comic books in a completely new way. I decided to redraw the sketch how I would do it today (and in about an hour). It‚Äôs too easy to think I‚Äôve not learned anything in the last 2 years when drawings don‚Äôt turn out the way I want. But this exercise really made me realize how far I‚Äôve come, even if I know how far I still want to go.

#art #drawing #sketch #sketching #pencil #ink #spiderman #marvel #comicart #instaart #learntodraw #study

item.title: Roidrage
item.description: Because art should be fun here‚Äôs a hyper realist painting of @roidrage in celebration of his recent forays into woodworking and the forest. Also I never thought ‚Äûshirtless lumberjack‚Äú would end up in my search history. Done in watercolor and gouache on Clairefontaine mixed media paper.
item.content:encoded:
Because art should be fun here‚Äôs a hyper realist painting of @roidrage in celebration of his recent forays into woodworking and the forest. Also I never thought ‚Äûshirtless lumberjack‚Äú would end up in my search history. Done in watercolor and gouache on Clairefontaine mixed media paper.

item.title: Bridgeman study
item.description: Anatomy studies after George Bridgman. I‚Äôve been watching the @stevehustonartist course on sketchbooking on @newmastersacademy and was immediately hooked. I got a scrapbook and filled my @lamy_official joy with bronze ink. And it‚Äôs been very enjoyable to just experiment and learn and worry less about feeling like I need to ‚Äúfinish‚Äù something.
item.content:encoded:
Anatomy studies after George Bridgman. I‚Äôve been watching the @stevehustonartist course on sketchbooking on @newmastersacademy and was immediately hooked. I got a scrapbook and filled my @lamy_official joy with bronze ink. And it‚Äôs been very enjoyable to just experiment and learn and worry less about feeling like I need to ‚Äúfinish‚Äù something.

#art #sketchbook #sketching #anatomy #lamy #lamyjoy #fountainpen #instaart

item.description: Harley Quinn based on that one scene in the Suicide Squad movie. Ink and watercolor on A4 paper. This one took me a while and I had already abandoned it after pencils because I wasn‚Äôt happy with it. But I really like how it turned out and I‚Äôm glad I gave it another try.
item.content:encoded:
Harley Quinn based on that one scene in the Suicide Squad movie. Ink and watercolor on A4 paper. This one took me a while and I had already abandoned it after pencils because I wasn‚Äôt happy with it. But I really like how it turned out and I‚Äôm glad I gave it another try.

item.title: Jean Grey
item.description: Finally done with this teen Jean Grey piece I‚Äôve tried to finish for a while now. Absolutely inspired by @el_vic_ibanez_‚Äôs Jean Grey. One of my fav characters and I loved her standalone run as well as her Generations issue. Swipe for some process pics and my desk with a @jimlee stream in the background which always inspires me to just draw.
item.content:encoded:
Finally done with this teen Jean Grey piece I‚Äôve tried to finish for a while now. Absolutely inspired by @el_vic_ibanez_‚Äôs Jean Grey. One of my fav characters and I loved her standalone run as well as her Generations issue. Swipe for some process pics and my desk with a @jimlee stream in the background which always inspires me to just draw.
